title: ma madura
sahitya:
mA madhura sArasa sarasa mA sadguNa nidhiyE gati



anupallavi



mA madhurApuri mInAkSi aruL bAlA vaDivElA sukha shIlA mighu kOlAhala



caraNam



dAruni karudAra dhIra ghana gambhIra vIra mAra shrI subhramaNya mUrti

gAngEya mUrti kalyANa gAnamUrti kavi kunjara dAsanApta mUrti
